description: Detects changes to Microsoft Office protected view registry keys with which the attacker disables this feature.
author: frack113
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Microsoft Office Protected View Disabled
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee]\\\\.*/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\\\[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy]\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Tt][Ee][Dd][Vv][Ii][Ee][Ww]\\\\.*/) AND (((winlog.event_data.Details:/[Dd][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\ \(0[Xx]00000001\)/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\\\[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Aa][Tt][Tt][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ee][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ss][Ii][Nn][Pp][Vv]/ OR /.*\\\\[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Nn][Ee][Tt][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss][Ii][Nn][Pp][Vv]/ OR /.*\\\\[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ii][Nn][Tt][Rr][Aa][Nn][Ee][Tt][Cc][Hh][Ee][Cc][Kk]/ OR /.*\\\\[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Uu][Nn][Ss][Aa][Ff][Ee][Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss][Ii][Nn][Pp][Vv]/))) OR ((winlog.event_data.Details:/[Dd][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\ \(0[Xx]00000000\)/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\\\[Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa][Bb][Aa][Ss][Ee][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Pp][Rr][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Tt][Ee][Dd][Vv][Ii][Ee][Ww]/ OR /.*\\\\[Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ff][Oo][Rr][Ee][Ii][Gg][Nn][Tt][Ee][Xx][Tt][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Pp][Rr][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Tt][Ee][Dd][Vv][Ii][Ee][Ww]/)))))
